title: Enhancing University Active Learning Effectiveness Through Team Informercial Assignments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level theoretical knowledge in science disciplines
context.additional_context: Students utilize personal mobile devices or laptops for team collaboration and task completion, with summative assessments measuring learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Students enhance their ability to transform scientific concepts into creative visual materials through a team infomercial task.
Learners apply effective communication and problem-solving strategies during collaborative processes to improve team performance by over 20%.
Participants develop an action plan to apply knowledge acquired through task performance to real-world scientific contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
